metadata.title: CVE-2020-14212 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: FFmpeg through 4.3 has a heap-based buffer overflow in avio_get_str inlibavformat/aviobuf.c because dnn_backend_native.c callsff_dnn_load_model_native and a certain index check is omitted.

criterions.comment: qtwebengine-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
